industry-news.title: Nanobodies: The Next Generation of Antibody Therapeutics
industry-news.summary: Discovered by accident in camel serum, Nanobodies are a unique class of antibodies. This article explores their structural advantages over IgG, manufacturing benefits, and applications in cancer and COVID-19 treatment.

industry-news.title: Beyond IgG: Different types of antibody drugs for cancer treatments
industry-news.summary: From Bi-specifics and ADCs to newer technologies like DACs (Degrader-Antibody Conjugates) and ACC (Antibody-Cell Conjugation), this article summarizes the diverse landscape of antibody therapeutics.

industry-news.title: 2026 JPM: Biopharma Deal-Making Forecast: Trends in M&A, AI, and Innovation
industry-news.summary: Highlights from the J.P. Morgan Healthcare Conference panel on 2026 deal-making trends, covering M&A strategies, the rise of China and AI in innovation, and the shift towards curative therapies.

industry-news.title: 2026 JPM: Key Insights from Novo Nordisk's CEO on the Future of Pharma
industry-news.summary: Novo Nordisk CEO Mike Doustdar shares insights on disciplined M&A strategy, the consumerization of the obesity market, and the shift towards patient-paid healthcare models.

industry-news.title: Insights from Nobel Laureate Dr. Fred Ramsdell - Communication, Fit for Purpose, and the Biotech Industry
industry-news.summary: Nobel Laureate Dr. Fred Ramsdell discusses the critical need for better science communication, the 'fit for purpose' research approach, and the parallels between early monoclonal antibodies and today's cell therapies.

biotech-companies.title: PeptiDream — A Japanese Biotech Company Specializing in Next-Generation PDCs
biotech-companies.summary: PeptiDream is a Japanese biotech company famous for its RaPID platform. They specialize in macrocyclic peptides to target proteins that are difficult for traditional antibodies or small molecules.

biotech-companies.title: Eli Lilly and Company (LLY): Corporate Overview, Pipeline, and Financial Analysis
biotech-companies.summary: A deep dive into Eli Lilly's century-long history, its dominance in the GLP-1 market with Mounjaro and Zepbound, and its strategic pipeline expansion into oncology and genetic medicine.

diseases.title: Dengue Fever: History, Virology, and Clinical Management
diseases.summary: An overview of Dengue Fever, covering the history of its first isolation by Susumu Hotta, viral structure, clinical presentation, and the current landscape of vaccines like Qdenga and Dengvaxia.

diseases.title: Menopause VMS and the Era of Non-Hormonal Treatments
diseases.summary: An overview of the pathophysiology of menopausal vasomotor symptoms (VMS), the role of KNDy neurons, and the latest non-hormonal treatments including Fezolinetant and the newly approved Elinzanetant.

diseases.title: ADHD: Mechanisms, Standard Treatments, and the 2026 Pipeline
diseases.summary: A comprehensive review of ADHD pathophysiology, standard of care (Stimulants vs Non-Stimulants), and the next generation of drugs including Centanafadine and Orexin agonists.

wetlab.title: Agar vs. Agarose: Are they interchangeable?
wetlab.summary: We use both in the lab, but do you know the chemical difference? A look at composition, cost, and why we don't use agar for DNA gels (usually), plus some funny lab anecdotes.

data-analysis.title: YouTube Data Analysis and Visualization
data-analysis.summary: This is the index page for the YouTube Data Analytics series. It introduces the motivation behind the project, details the dataset used, and provides links to the other analysis articles in the series.

data-analysis.title: YouTube trending video data (1) - US
data-analysis.summary: Analyzing trending YouTube videos in the US from 2020-2022 using R. Investigating top channels, categories, and revenue estimates.

data-analysis.title: YouTube trending video data (2) - Canada
data-analysis.summary: Following the US analysis, this post explores YouTube trending videos in Canada from 2020 to 2022, analyzing popular categories, channels, and estimated ad revenue.
